Articles.Content:
Hello and welcome to Kerbal Space Program!

Mods: http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal

It might show most controls for KSP but not all.

Other Controls:

U - Lights

[ - Switch to a nearby object or ship

] - Switch back to previous object or ship

C - Cockpit View

V - Switch to another Kerbal (if in cockpit view) and switch to different views (outside view)

Alt + F12 - Debug Menu (for cheats, debug mode and database)

F5 - Quick save

F9 - Load quick save

1 - Action group 01

2 - Action group 02

3 - Action group 03

4 - Action group 04

5 - Action group 05

6 - Action group 06

7 - Action group 07

8 - Action group 08

9 - Action group 09

1+0 - Action group 10

My profile: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/117899-CDK not much to see.

Er, welcome. This is you introducing yourself is it, or trying to help other new people?

The wiki has a good page on controls, if you'd like to check it.
I was trying to help new people
